messages.content:
Hey, {name}! 🔥
I have an exclusive webinar recording for you, where I reveal the opportunity of the decade! 📈💰
So far, 1-7% monthly returns and over 1000% asset appreciation – and this is just the beginning!
🎥 Watch the recording now before we take it down from the website!

Are you ready to take the first step? 🌟 Here is your unique Academy Link, where you’ll find a detailed plan on how to get started:

✅ Create and connect your wallet
💳 Purchase POLs
🎟️ Get your ticket to the world of Betfin
🔄 Exchange POLs for BETs
💎 Stake your BET Tokens and start earning profits!

👉 Your Academy Link:
{academyLink}

💬 Have questions? Join our community on Discord and ask experienced members! 🚀
{network}
So, have you managed to stake? 🏆 You’re already on the right track! Keep going and don’t miss the next steps to maximize your returns. 💰🚀

‼️ Haven’t watched it yet? This is your chance! 🔥

📅 Date and time of the next call:
{opportunityCall}

🌟 What will you learn?
✅ How everything works
✅ How to achieve high returns with minimal risk
✅ LIVE Q&A – ask anything you want!
🎟️ Registration is FREE, but spots are limited! Join now before it’s full!

⏳ Today at 6:00 PM, a webinar is starting that could change your life! 🚀
❌ Don’t miss your chance – tonight you’ll learn how to make the most of this opportunity! 💰💎
📌 Join on time so you don’t miss anything!

🚀 STARTING SOON!
📢 Last chance to join the webinar and be part of it!
🔴 Click and watch LIVE! 🎥👇
